const[selectedItems,setSelectedItems]=React.useState([]);// 处理数量变化
const handleQuantityChange=(productId,quantity)=>{if(quantity>0){dispatch(updateQuantity({productId,quantity}));}};// 删除商品
const handleRemoveItem=productId=>{dispatch(removeFromCart(productId));message.success('商品已从购物车中移除');};// 清空购物车
const handleClearCart=()=>{dispatch(clearCart());message.success('购物车已清空');};// 切换商品选择状态
const handleToggleSelection=productId=>{setSelectedItems(prev=>prev.includes(productId)?prev.filter(id=>id!==productId):[...prev,productId]);};// 全选/取消全选
const handleSelectAll=checked=>{if(checked){setSelectedItems(items.map(item=>item.product.id));}else{setSelectedItems([]);}};// 结算
const handleCheckout=()=>{const selectedCartItems=items.filter(item=>selectedItems.includes(item.product.id));if(selectedCartItems.length===0){message.warning('请选择要结算的商品');return;}// 这里暂时只是模拟跳转到订单页面

const calculateSelectedTotal=()=>{return items.filter(item=>selectedItems.includes(item.product.id)).reduce((total,item)=>total+item.product.price*item.quantity,0);};// 表格列定义
